thread.title_full: Lovely Girls weekend at Brady - Review of Hotel Brady Gare de L'Est, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: natashamB2400NF
title: Lovely Girls weekend at Brady -
text:
We enjoyd our time staying at Brady and BIG plus to the staff for being very understanding and well treating.
Service was great!
Rooms could be more cleaner, even tho we understand the building is quite old.
Bisous; Natasha, Sara and Amira from Finland
